snippet: The claim by Egypt's interior minister that police officers did not fire birdshot at protesters appears to be contradicted by photographs, X-rays and video.
abstract: The claim by Egypt's interior minister that police officers did not fire birdshot at protesters appears to be contradicted by photographs, X-rays and video.
lead_paragraph: As an Egyptian news site, Ahram Online, reported, the country's interior minister denied on Tuesday that police officers had fired shotguns loaded with birdshot at protesters in Cairo in the past week.

headline.main: Egyptian Activist Shows Birdshot Injuries to Rebut Claim Pellets Were Not Fired

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
